summary: Makes One-Handed perks affect Unarmed attacks, and adds an Unarmed branch to the skill tree.
descriptionHtml:
The Way of The Monk mod has been released on the Nexus! 

Nexus Page: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15725

I would suggest that you replace this mod with my new mod the Way of the Monk. The Way of the Monk overhauls the Unarmed combat system, adding new skills (that do not replace vanilla skills), new items, new perks, and more. Check it out!

UPDATED TO VERSION 1.0

********************************Unarmed attacks with special item level up your OneHanded********************************

The version with a separate skill tree can be found in the files. Some people did not like it, so I changed it to not be the only main version.

Makes One-Handed perks affect Unarmed attacks, raises your one-handed by using unarmed attacks, and adds an Unarmed branch to the skill tree.

CLICK SUBSCRIBE TO DOWNLOAD.

IF YOU ENJOY IT, PLEASE RATE, FAVORITE, AND SUBSCRIBE.

To download a version of this mod that has a separate skill tree, click here: 

This mod can also be found on the Skyrim Nexus at: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8288

Perks:
There are a number of unique Unarmed perks added to the game:

Exhilarating Blows Rank 1: 03002306 (unarmed attacks do stamina damage)
Exhilarating Blows Rank 2: 03002307
Exhilarating Blows Rank 3: 03002308
Disarming Blow (requires rank two in Exhilarating Blows, adds chance to disarm): 15002DDB
Flurry (incerases attack speed of unarmed attacks): 150028AF
Staggering Blow (chance to stagger enemies): 15003E14
Fists of Power (Light Armor perk, same as Fists of Steel): 15002876

FEATURES:

+ Adds an Unarmed branch to the Onehanded skill tree, with unique perks
+ Adds a perk like Fists of Steel to the Light Armor skill tree 
+ Adds 4 unique Unarmed perks
+ \"Unarmed Weapon\" added to use ingame, advances your One-Handed skill
+ Sneak damage multiplier perks affect unarmed attacks

Here is a list of the future modifications that I have planned:

+ Unique unarmed weapons (like in Fallout)
+ Modify Fists of Steel and Fists of Power perks so that they take modified armor ratings into account (if possible)
+ Allow killshot anims for left hand attack (if possible)
+ Find a model to replace the piece of charcoal with
author: Shawn
